thread.title: Great Communication & Perfect Space for our Wedding Ceremony
thread.title_full: Great Communication & Perfect Space for our Wedding Ceremony - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: joelle0589
title: Great Communication & Perfect Space for our Wedding Ceremony
text:
My husband & i chose the CitizenM NYC to be the location for our Wedding ceremony. We were only having a small ceremony of no more than 25 guests & we were looking for somewhere simple with views & the Citizen M was perfect. While arranging this, the email communication back & forth was great! All questions & queries were answered efficiently. When we arrived we had a lovely little Congratulations card awaiting our arrival in our room. It was lovely.
on our wedding day, the staff were very accomidating & helpful in every possible way. nothing we asked was too much of an issue. We had a great experience with Citizen M & will definitely return in future!
